text: Nielsen Media Research (NMR) is an American company that measures media audiences (people), including television, radio, theatre films and newspapers. ==Related pages== *Automated Measurement of Lineups (AMOL) *Media Market or Designated Market Area (DMA) ==Other websites== *'The Nielsen Company' formerly known as VNU Group B.V. *Designated Market Area *Nielsen Media Research *The Nielsen Company *VNU Group bv Category:Media in the United States Category:Market researchers
title: Nielsen Media Research
